changes:
- Fixed the /rate command, now properly works with single argument
- Added the subcommand `/rate [[number]] [[currency1]] to [[currency2]]`
- Added changelog command
- Added an option to use 'ignorelast' argument with reaction command. Adds the last sent file to the list of ignored files. Usable only by owner.
- Added a check for Thumbs.db when sending an image.

- Some housekeeping (updated the API version)
- Renamed AskStason to AskMe

- `[New]` Added the ability to interpret command body as well as the command name
- `[New]` Added the reaction 'set' subcommand, which allows to request an image from a specific folder
- `[Fix]` Added filtering pictures by ext-n at launch, so there should be no more issues with accidental .webm files in the folder
- `[New]` Added the ability to use decimals in the rate command (thanks @forcewake)
